title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 150.2 - Coverage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 150.2 - Coverage

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to all annual salaried employees in the

Security Supervisors Negotiating Unit in the competitive, noncompetitive and
labor classes whose positions have been allocated to a salary grade, and other
employees whose positions are unallocated but are equated to salary grades by
the Director of the Budget. Excluded from coverage are those employees paid on
other than an annual basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
150.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
